mitre_attack_techniques.signature_description: Enumerates processes within the "proc" file system
Uses the "uname" system call to query kernel version information (possible evasion)
Reads system information from the proc file system
Reads CPU information from /sys indicative of miner or evasive malware
Executes the "uname" command used to read OS and architecture name
Reads CPU information from /proc indicative of miner or evasive malware
Executes the "free" command used for querying memory usage (likely indicative for DDoS or mining capabilities)
